testcase.name: test_01_unpaid_order_should_not_add_to_total_sales
testcase.failure: backend/tests/test_sales_total_bug.py:137: in test_01_unpaid_order_should_not_add_to_total_sales order = self.create_order(paid_amount=0, total=500) ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ backend/tests/test_sales_total_bug.py:95: in create_order assert response.status_code == 200, f"Failed to create order: {response.text}" E AssertionError: Failed to create order: {"status":400,"message":"\"subTotal\" is required"} E assert 400 == 200 E + where 400 = <Response [400]>.status_code
